error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect, please check your API key and network connection.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication. Please check your API key. You can get your API key from [Fish Audio API Keys]({api_keys_url}).

data_description.api_key: Your personal API key for accessing the Fish Audio service.

user.description:
Enter your Fish Audio API key to begin.

If you don't have an account, you can sign up for a free one on [Fish Audio]({signup_url}).
user.title: Connect to Fish Audio

abort.already_configured: This TTS voice is already configured.
abort.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Fish Audio
abort.entry_not_loaded: Cannot add TTS voice while the configuration is disabled.
abort.no_models_found: No voices found matching the specified filters. Please adjust your filters and try again.
abort.reconfigure_successful: Your TTS voice has been updated successfully. The integration will now reload with the new settings.

error.no_model_selected: You must select a voice to continue.
error.no_models_found: No voices found matching the specified filters.

data_description.language: Display only voices that support the selected language.
data_description.self_only: When checked, this will only show the voices you have personally created or cloned.
data_description.sort_by: Choose the order in which the voices are displayed.
data_description.title: Filter voices by name.

init.description: Apply filters to narrow down the voice list, then click Submit to see the results.
init.title: Voice selection filters

data_description.backend: Select the AI model that will generate the audio.
data_description.latency: Choose the latency mode: 'normal' for standard processing or 'balanced' for optimized speed.
data_description.name: Enter a unique name for this TTS voice to easily identify it in Home Assistant.
data_description.voice_id: Choose from the list of available voices, or manually enter a specific voice ID.

model.description: Select your preferred voice and the AI model to use for speech synthesis.
model.title: Choose your voice and model
